scripts.vercel-build: pnpm approve-builds -y && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--trace-uncaught --enable-source-maps" next build
scripts.build: node -e "if(process.env.DISABLE_DB==='1'){console.log('DISABLE_DB=1 set, skipping db:migrate');process.exit(0);}console.log('Running db:migrate (will continue on failure)');try{require('child_process').spawnSync('pnpm',['db:migrate'],{stdio:'inherit'})}catch(e){console.log('DB migration failed, continuing with build...');}process.exit(0);" && next build
